title: Getting Started
text: dbProject package provides user-friendly approach creating managaing local database connection. relies pins connections R packages. dbProject objects R6 object contains pinned connection object pinned objects user-specified directory known pins_board. reasons might want use dbProject approach : Reconnecting database necessary (e.g. restarting R disconnecting). Saving lazy database tables. Performing common database connection handling operations (e.g. connect, reconnect, etc).

what: Creating and Connecting to a Local OLAP Database with DBI
title: Getting Started
text: conventional approach establishing connection local OLAP database R dbConnect method shown .

previous_headings: Introduction > Creating and Connecting to a Local OLAP Database with DBI
title: Getting Started
text: create new dbProject object, use dbProject$new() method follows arguments used DBI::dbConnect() method shown , added path argument. drv DBI driver object, e.g. duckdb::duckdb(). path refers location pins_board object stored. connection object pinned objects stored. ... additional arguments passed DBI::dbConnect(). Note dbProject objects R6 objects, access object’s methods using $ operator. dbProject$print() method run whenever object printed. displays path board attributes object, well contents board.
code: proj <- dbProject$new(drv = duckdb::duckdb(), path = "test3", dbdir = 'test.db') #> Creating new version '20250511T194832Z-7cf96' #> Writing to pin 'cachedConnection' #> Manifest file written to root folder of board, as `_pins.yaml`  proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✔ Connected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test3 #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2025-05-11 19:48:32       194 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Database Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test.db

previous_headings: Introduction > Creating and Connecting to a Local OLAP Database with DBI
title: Getting Started
text: done database connection, can disconnect using dbProject$disconnect() method. method closes current connection, .
code: proj$disconnect()  proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✖ Disconnected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test3 #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2025-05-11 19:48:32       194 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> ℹ No active connection.

previous_headings: Introduction > Creating and Connecting to a Local OLAP Database with DBI
title: Getting Started
text: reconnect database, use dbProject$reconnect() method. method reads connection object pins_board object reconnects database.
code: proj$reconnect() #>  #> Attaching package: 'connections' #> The following object is masked from 'package:dbProject': #>  #>     connection_pin_read #> Loading required package: DBI  proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✔ Connected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test3 #> # A tibble: 1 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2025-05-11 19:48:32       194 <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Database Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test.db

previous_headings: Introduction > Creating and Connecting to a Local OLAP Database with DBI
title: Getting Started
text: can add database table pins_board object using proj$pin_write() method. method writes database table board.
code: con <- proj$get_connection() # note: getConnection() returns a connConnection object from the {connections} R package. mtcars <- dplyr::copy_to(con, mtcars, temporary = FALSE, overwrite = TRUE) mtcars #> # Source:   table<mtcars> [?? x 11] #> # Database: DuckDB v1.2.2 [unknown@Linux 6.11.0-1013-azure:R 4.5.0//home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test.db] #>      mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5     0     1     4     4 #>  2  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0     0     1     4     4 #>  3  22.8     4  108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6     1     1     4     1 #>  4  21.4     6  258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4     1     0     3     1 #>  5  18.7     8  360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0     0     0     3     2 #>  6  18.1     6  225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2     1     0     3     1 #>  7  14.3     8  360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8     0     0     3     4 #>  8  24.4     4  147.    62  3.69  3.19  20       1     0     4     2 #>  9  22.8     4  141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9     1     0     4     2 #> 10  19.2     6  168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3     1     0     4     4 #> # ℹ more rows proj$pin_write(x = mtcars, name = 'mtcars') #> Creating new version '20250511T194833Z-4ced3' #> Writing to pin 'mtcars' #> Manifest file written to root folder of board, as `_pins.yaml`  proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✔ Connected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test3 #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2025-05-11 19:48:32       194 <pins_met> #> 2 mtcars           rds   dbProject pin… 2025-05-11 19:48:33     3.02K <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Database Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test.db #> ℹ Tables: #> • mtcars

previous_headings: Introduction > Creating and Connecting to a Local OLAP Database with DBI
title: Getting Started
text: R session restart disconnecting database, can read pinned database table using proj$pin_read() method. method reads pinned object board.
code: proj$disconnect()  proj #> ─────────────────────────────────── dbProject ────────────────────────────────── #> ✖ Disconnected #> ── Board Content ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Board Path: /home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test3 #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   name             type  title          created             file_size meta       #>   <chr>            <chr> <chr>          <dttm>              <fs::byt> <list>     #> 1 cachedConnection rds   connConnectio… 2025-05-11 19:48:32       194 <pins_met> #> 2 mtcars           rds   dbProject pin… 2025-05-11 19:48:33     3.02K <pins_met> #> ── Database Content ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> ℹ No active connection.  # read the pinned lazy table object mtcars <- proj$pin_read(name = 'mtcars')  mtcars #> # Source:   table<mtcars> [?? x 11] #> # Database: DuckDB v1.2.2 [unknown@Linux 6.11.0-1013-azure:R 4.5.0//home/runner/work/dbproject-r/dbproject-r/vignettes/test.db] #>      mpg   cyl  disp    hp  drat    wt  qsec    vs    am  gear  carb #>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #>  1  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.62  16.5     0     1     4     4 #>  2  21       6  160    110  3.9   2.88  17.0     0     1     4     4 #>  3  22.8     4  108     93  3.85  2.32  18.6     1     1     4     1 #>  4  21.4     6  258    110  3.08  3.22  19.4     1     0     3     1 #>  5  18.7     8  360    175  3.15  3.44  17.0     0     0     3     2 #>  6  18.1     6  225    105  2.76  3.46  20.2     1     0     3     1 #>  7  14.3     8  360    245  3.21  3.57  15.8     0     0     3     4 #>  8  24.4     4  147.    62  3.69  3.19  20       1     0     4     2 #>  9  22.8     4  141.    95  3.92  3.15  22.9     1     0     4     2 #> 10  19.2     6  168.   123  3.92  3.44  18.3     1     0     4     4 #> # ℹ more rows
